attributes.action: Review the Smoking Ban (not repeal it) to make it realistic and non-victimising.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is widely accepted that the details of the “Smoking Ban” fail to either protect the public from passive smoking or protect the rights of the smokers.

The legislation is written in such a way that it is illegal smoke in the one place where you are now most likely to find people smoking... Street Doorways:
Premises are substantially enclosed if they have a roof and less than 50% open.

We would like the legislation reviewed and amended to protect the rights of the smokers and also ensure an improved protection for the public from passive smoking.
